title: 252 - Which of the 3 Stages of The Creative Path are You in Right Now?

SPONSORS

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://skl.sh/creativepeptalk to get started!!!

STORYBLOCKS
This episode is brought to you by Storyblocks Video. Story Blocks give you studio-quality 4k stock video without blowing your budget. If you need b-roll, after effects templates, or video motion background you gotta check out Storyblocks Video. Head to http://storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk to learn more about Storyblocks Video today.
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Andy J. Pizza)

itunes:title: 252 - Which of the 3 Stages of The Creative Path are You in Right Now?
itunes:author: Andy J. Pizza
itunes:summary:
TODAY ON THE SHOW I want to explore some territory we’ve touched on in the past in a totally new way.

WHY? Because I’ve had some personal breakthroughs on this content that have me PEPPED OUT OF MY MIND!!!!!

AND because I believe the content in this show is FOUNDATIONAL to a thriving creative career. The framework in this episode is a pattern I see in EVERY one of my thriving creative heroes and it’s information I revisit on a WEEKLY BASIS.

For that reason I want to DIVE DEEPER into this content. It’s part refresher / part reinvention / part perspective shift.

I hope this episode lights you on fire as much as it has me!!! and acts as a catalyst for HUGE creative career breakthrough!!

ALSO

OUR NEW SKILLSHARE CLASS IS OUT NOW!!!!

Today’s episode can be used as BONUS material for the class that enhances your experience OR as standalone content that JAZZES YOU UP WITH TACTICAL PRACTICAL ACTIONABLE TIPS! CHOOSE YOUR OWN ADVENTURE!!!!
